clues.text: Tributary rivers of this lake include the Cuyahoga, Detroit & Sandusky
Noughts & crosses is a British name for this game, but whatever you call it, it's still a tie with best play

A somewhat formal word for a bedroom, or the area of a firearm that holds the ammunition
In a nursery rhyme his broken crown was patched "with vinegar and brown paper"

In Hell's Kitchen, you don't need a Steinway or a Stradi to make music; Ali's love interestplays drums on buckets, & she joins in for this song that says, "She's a flame""You can try, but you'll never forget her name, she's on top of the world, hottest of the hottest girls say, oh-oh"
